name: Abracadaver
description: Keeps forgetting that the magic word is "Please."

name: Acid Rain
description: Strong enough to destroy a Plant, but pH-balanced for a Zombie.

name: Aerobics Instructor
description: Aerobics really bring the dead to life.

name: Alien Ooze
description: Oozin' for a bruisin!

name: All-Star Zombie
description: Gives 110% on the field. Has no idea what a football is.

name: Ancient Vimpire
description: Vimpirism - an ancient curse evolved from the dawn of time.

name: Area 22
description: "Zombies from outer space? What an absurd conspiracy theory! Now move along. Nothing to see here." - Dr. Zomboss

name: Arm Wrestler
description: Lots of carbs, lots of protein, and five brain shakes a day.

name: B-flat
description: Just wait until you C-Sharp.

name: Backup Dancer
description: Spent six years perfecting his art at the Chewliard School for the Performing Arts.

name: Backyard Bounce
description: Zombies love trampolines. Not everyone knows that.

name: Bad Moon Rising
description: Sometimes a full moon turns bad dreams into horrible nightmares.

name: Barrel of Barrels
description: If you put a container in another container, you'll have twice the storage space!

name: Barrel of Deadbeards
description: No monkeys, just Zombies.

name: Barrel Roller Zombie
description: The second-most affordable way to transport Imps.

name: Baseball Zombie
description: Home run. Running for your home. It's all the same to him.

name: Beam Me Up
description: A sure way to get Space Cadet's attention.

name: Binary Stars
description: He's a Gemini and so is she. Which explains so much, right?

name: Biodome Botanist
description: Growing Plants in Space? Some of his fellow Zombies think he's crazy, but others appreciate the effort.

name: Black Hole
description: Plants usually like being planted in holes. Black holes? Not so much.

name: Blowgun Imp
description: Much more successful than his cousin, the Inhalegun Imp.

name: Bobblehead
description: He offers a special deal: Two of his heads for one of yours. Anyway you slice it, you still come out a head.

name: Bonus Track Buckethead
description: He put all his favorite songs on that mixtape. If only he could find the right Zombie to give it to.

name: Brain Vendor
description: Sells only 100% organic brains.

name: Brute Strength
description: Is there any other kind?

name: Buckethead
description: Why a bucket? Well, gosh, in this economy, why NOT?

name: Bungee Plumber
description: Likes: Plumbing and adventure sports. Dislikes: Belts.

name: Buried Treasure
description: Neptuna knew only one way to motivate an army of invading zombie pirates. Tell them about the secret treasure.

name: Cakesplosion
description: 4 eggs. 2 cups flour. 10 sticks TNT.

name: Camel Crossing
description: Camels - they're filthy, ill-tempered animals that'll spit on you just for fun. But Zombies love 'em all the same.

name: Captain Deadbeard
description: Yo ho ho! It's a pirate's unlife for him!

name: Captain Flameface
description: You get your beard caught in the toaster ONE time, and it's all anyone can talk about...

name: Cardboard Robot Zombie
description: He's Rustbolt's biggest fan.

name: Carried Away
description: It's just Super Brainz' way of sharing the wonder of flight with his fellow Zombies.

name: Cat Lady
description: The cat on the left is a Z-Tube celebrity.

name: Celestial Custodian
description: Don't call him a "Space Janitor." He's a "Celestial Custodian" and darn proud of it.

name: Cell Phone Zombie
description: Hang on - he's got to take this.

name: Cheese Cutter
description: Is that the exquisite scent of an aged Camembert, or just rotting flesh?

name: Chimney Sweep
description: It's a growth industry.

name: Chum Champion
description: The Retiarius gladiator was classically armed with a trident, a net, and a 10-day-old fish.

name: Coffee Zombie
description: He's been trying to cut back.

name: Cone Zone
description: You are about to enter another dimension. A dimension not only of sight and sound, but of cones.

name: Conehead
description: Almost went out with a lampshade on his head. Thought better of it.

name: Conga Zombie
description: Important Note: The fruit on her hat is made of plastic.

name: Copter Commando
description: Refuses to fly over water due to a severe case of aquaphobia.

name: Cosmic Dancer
description: Across the cosmos, the passion for dance is the only universal language.

name: Cosmic Imp
description: When he gazes out at the stars, he feels small. Because he's an Imp.

name: Cosmic Scientist
description: He has no idea what's in the beakers. He just likes to mix them together until they go BOOM!

name: Cosmic Sports Star
description: He's been named Most Valuable Zombie of the Galaxy two years in a row!

name: Cosmic Yeti
description: He's hoping they name a constellation after him. "The Big Yeti" does have a ring to it.

name: Cryo-Brain
description: Putting brains on ice is the best way to keep them fresh. Ask any Zombie.

name: Cryo-Yeti
description: Freezing Plants in the far reaches of Space is not what he'd imagined he'd spend his life doing. But as the old Yeti saying goes, "When life hands you snow, you make snow cones."

name: Cuckoo Zombie
description: He always knows what time it is. CRAZY TIME!

name: Cursed Gargolith
description: The lost temples of Hollow Earth were mysterious and inviting. Until they started to move.

name: Cut Down to Size
description: "The tallest blade of grass is the first to get cut. Braaainz!" - Ancient Zombie Proverb

name: Cyborg Zombie
description: He'll be back.

name: Dance Off
description: You put your right foot in! No, wait, you might need that.

name: Deep Sea Gargantuar
description: Has every single issue of Deep Sea Quarterly, but rarely has time to read them.

name: Defensive End
description: Someone once told him the best defense is a good offence. He disagrees. Da fence he like best is da one he SMASH through.

name: Disco Dance Floor
description: The Triassic Invasion brought the very best of Zombie culture: Disco.

name: Disco Zombie
description: Disco is undead.

name: Disco-Naut
description: Nothing focuses your aim like the super-sick wailing of a space keytar solo.

name: Disco-Tron 3000
description: A fully weaponized jukebox.

name: Dog Walker
description: Is the Zombie walking the dog, or is the dog walking the Zombie? Hard to say.

name: Dolphin Rider
description: The dolphin is also a Zombie.

name: Dolphinado
description: Weather report calls for afternoon tornados with a 75% chance of sea mammals.

name: Dr. Spacetime
description: He insists it's more than a screwdriver. Much more.

name: Drum Major
description: Recently promoted from Drum Minor.

name: Duckstache
description: Determined to find every Mustache Monument in Hollow Earth, Neptuna brought in the experts.

name: Ducky Tube Zombie
description: Zombie Ducky, joy of joys. When it squeezes, you make noise!

name: Electrician
description: He charges for the full hour.

name: Electrobolt
description: Ever get zapped by static electricity? It's like that, times a bazillion.

name: Energy Drink Zombie
description: He can quit any time he wants.

name: Escape Through Time
description: Possible side effects include: the creation of a temporal paradox, the unraveling of the fabric of reality, erasing your entire existence, a mild foot rash.

name: Eureka
description: Professor Brainstorm's ideas are brilliant... totally random, but brilliant.

name: Evaporate
description: Did you know that Plants are 62 percent water? Well, not any more.

name: Evolutionary Leap
description: When Dr. Zomboss sent Meteor Z and Huge-Gigantacus from space, they smashed a tunnel to the center of the Earth. There, Plants and Zombies had evolved into insane new forms.

name: Excavator Zombie
description: He loved finding dinosaur fossils, until the dinosaurs started finding him.

name: Exploding Fruitcake
description: Once you get past all the dynamite and bombs, fruitcakes actually contain at least 5% Fruit.

name: Exploding Imp
description: You could say he's an IMPlosives expert.

name: Extinction Event
description: Sometimes the evolutionary tree withers at the root.

name: Final Mission
description: The round-trip ticket is the same price as the one-way.

name: Fire Rooster
description: According to the Chinese Zodiac, it's the year of the Fire Rooster. Crispy fried Plants for all your Zombies!

name: Firefighter
description: He's a little too eager to rescue kittens from trees.

name: Fireworks Zombie
description: Want to clear some mushrooms? Fire works.

name: Fishy Imp
description: Throws the *best* pool parties.

name: Flag Zombie
description: He's not patriotic; he just likes fabric suspended from sticks.

name: Flamenco Zombie
description: Also enjoys dancing the rumba, tango, and the Hokey Pokey.

name: Foot Soldier Zombie
description: Each Foot Soldier Zombie shall be issued one (1) combat foot.

name: Fraidy Cat
description: What's a black cat's favorite color? Purrrrr-ple.

name: Frankentuar
description: IT'S ALIVE! IT'S ALI-I-I-IVE! Ok, strictly speaking, it's not alive.

name: Frosty Mustache
description: So stylish! So cool!

name: Frozen Tundra
description: Brain Freeze has a knack for making the Plants chill out.

name: Fun-Dead Raiser
description: Pledge now and get two Zombies plus a free tote bag.

name: Gadget Scientist
description: Wishes the Mad Chemist would stop copying his hair style.

name: Galvanize
description: To protect and serve... brains.

name: Gargantuar Mime
description: The Gargantuar Mime groans like any other zombie. He just does it silently, and in French.

name: Gargantuar-Throwing Gargantuar
description: The ultimate, epic, last, absolutely final conclusion to the Zombie-throwing Zombie saga. ...or is it?

name: Gargantuar-Throwing Imp
description: When lifting a Gargantuar, always bend at the knees. He learned this the hard way.

name: Gargantuars Feast
description: This party doesn't make reservations.

name: Gargologist
description: After years of studying Gargantuars in the wild, she's dedicated herself to telling the world they're just misunderstood gentle giants. So far, nobody's buying it.

name: Gas Giant
description: There isn't a fart joke he hasn't heard.

name: Genetic Experiment
description: Pickled Zombie is the best kind of Zombie.

name: Gentleman Zombie
description: Life comes and goes, but proper manners are forever.

name: Gizzard Lizard
description: He's the missing skink.

name: Goat
description: Hungry... Smelly... A lot like a Zombie but with 100% more goat.

name: Going Viral
description: Though Zombies can't get ill, this plague is totally sick.

name: Grave Robber
description: Why not rob graves? They're not going to miss it. It's not like the dead are rising up or anything.

name: Graveyard
description: Super Brainz always wanted a house with a nice yard.

name: Hail-a-Copter
description: Refuses to fly over water due to a severe case of aquaphobia.

name: Haunting Ghost
description: Is he a zombie? Is he a ghost? He refuses to be pigeonholed.

name: Haunting Zombie
description: He doesn't realize he would look even scarier without the spooky ghost costume...

name: Headstone Carver
description: His epitaphs have been published on headstones around the world.

name: Healthy Treat
description: Great for Zombie Health. Like a vitamin only sweeter.

name: Heroic Health
description: A healthy Hero is a happy Hero.

name: Hippity Hop Gargantuar
description: Sometimes, what has been seen... can't be unseen. This is one of those times.

name: Hot Dog Imp
description: He was THIS close to wearing the chicken costume, but darn it, Team Mascot Imp called it first.

name: Hover-Goat 3000
description: The future is Hovering. The future is Radical. The future is Goat.

name: Hunting Grounds
description: Are the Zombies hunting dinosaurs, or are the dinosaurs hunting them?

name: Ice Moon
description: Be sure to pack a warm sweater.

name: Ice Pirate
description: You wouldn't believe how many brains a chunk of space ice goes for on a black market. Let's just say, she's rolling in gray matter.

name: Imp
description: He's proficient in Zombie judo and Zombie karate. He also plays the Melodica.

name: Imp Commander
description: He's got a bit of a Napoleon Complex. Obviously.

name: Imp-Throwing Gargantuar
description: Seems like a better idea than a Gargantuar-Throwing Imp.

name: Imp-Throwing Imp
description: But where is the Imp-Throwing-Imp-Throwing-Imp?? We have to go deeper...

name: Impfinity Clone
description: An IMPerfect copy, but it'll do.

name: Imposter
description: It's IMPossible to tell who he really is.

name: In-Crypted
description: Requires eight characters, one upper case, a number, and the letter Z.

name: Interdimensional Zombie
description: In a parallel dimension, this zombie is a Space Pirate. In another he's a Trash Can Zombie. Turns out, little choices in life can make a big difference.

name: Intergalactic Warlord
description: In space Zombie circles, he's a very powerful figure. Just don't talk about him in front of Huge-Gigantacus. There's some jealousy there.

name: Interstellar Bounty Hunter
description: If you have a bounty on your head, she won't stop until she eats your brains. It's not personal. It's just business.

name: Iron Boarder
description: Working for a Huge-Gigantacus isn't the worst job he's ever had. It comes with a 401Z plan, which is more than what most Zombie employers offer.

name: Jester
description: The joke's on you!

name: Jurassic Fossilhead
description: For him, Fossilheading isn't just a hobby. It's a career.

name: Kangaroo Rider
description: Sure, it's a bumpy ride, but it beats walking. Have you seen an Imp's legs?

name: Killer Whale
description: Flooding Hollow Earth with water from above, Neptuna attacked with flying whale cavalry. Or really, falling whale cavalry.

name: King of the Grill
description: Chillin' beside the ol' backyard grill, cookin' up some brains, hangin' with his zombies... that's the good unlife.

name: Kitchen Sink Zombie
description: He's got everything but the - no wait, he's got that too.

name: Kite Flyer
description: The naysayers were right. Flying a kite in a lightning storm WAS a real bright idea.

name: Knight of the Living Dead
description: He's both secretary and treasurer for the Knights of the Square Table.

name: Knockout
description: No one knows where the giant green hand and the giant purple hand comes from. What will happen when they clap?

name: Landscaper
description: If barren rock and wilted Plants are what you want, he's the landscaper for the job.

name: Laser Base Alpha
description: Zombies with LASERS. What could possibly go wrong?

name: Leftovers
description: Zombies love them almost as much as brains.

name: Leprechaun Imp
description: When he offers to grant you a wish, do not wish for infinite wishes. It just doesn't work like that.

name: Line Dancing Zombie
description: In her opinion, there's no better song to line dance to than the "Zombie Shuffle."

name: Locust Swarm
description: A plague upon your lawns!

name: Loose Cannon
description: His friends keep telling him it's too dangerous, but he never listens. He's having a blast.

name: Lost Colosseum
description: The Legend of the Mustache Monuments led Zombie explorers to uncover ancient colosseums.

name: Loudmouth
description: What he lacks in size, he makes up for in volume.

name: Lurch for Lunch
description: Will work overtime for food.

name: Mad Chemist
description: He's not so much "mad" as he is "mildly annoyed."

name: Maniacal Laugh
description: It's not so much "hahaha" as it is "mwahahaha."

name: Medic
description: It's hard keeping Zombies on their feet. It's harder keeping feet on the Zombies.

name: Medulla Nebula
description: Zombies often find brains in space. It's usually the space between your ears.

name: Meteor Z
description: Huge-Gigantacus drove Meteor Z deep into the Earth, creating a tunnel to a hidden world of strange creatures...but what's down there???

name: Mini-Ninja
description: His motto: Walk softly and carry a big nunchuck.

name: Missile Madness
description: For Z-Mech, any target is a good target.

name: Mixed-Up Gravedigger
description: Digging graves is hard work, but seeing customers rise out of them makes it all worth it.

name: Mondo Bronto
description: Deep in Hollow Earth, Zombie warrior women tame herds of enormous dinosaurs. Any good history book will tell you that.

name: Monkey Smuggler
description: Piracy is serious monkey business.

name: Monster Mash
description: Zombies never feel more alive than when they're dancing.

name: Moon Base Z
description: Zombies landed on the Moon? Many believe it's nothing but a conspiracy theory, and yet, here's the proof.

name: Moonwalker
description: That's one small nibble for Zombies, one giant bite for Zombiekind.

name: Mountain Climber
description: She's climbed 'em all: Everest. K2. Your house.

name: Mustache Monument
description: If Neptuna's Triassic Invasion force can align all of Hollow Earth's Mustache Monuments at once, she will become truly unstoppable.

name: Mustache Waxer
description: Customers have been telling him "Get a brain" for years now.

name: Mystery Egg
description: "Mommy, where do little Zombies come from?" Asked and answered.

name: Neutron Imp
description: He's not small, he's just very compact.

name: Newspaper Zombie
description: Newspapers are an undead medium.

name: Nibble
description: Just a quick bite.

name: Nurse Gargantuar
description: Their bedside manner could use some work.

name: Octo Zombie
description: Is the correct term 'octopuses' or 'octopi'? You'd think he'd have an opinion, but he doesn't.

name: Octo-Pet
description: It's slimy, beady-eyed, and it leaves ink splotches wherever it goes. Neptuna loves it all the same.

name: Octo-Pult
description: Octopus incoming! Two words a Plant never wants to hear.

name: Orchestra Conductor
description: He isn't in it for the music. He just likes waving sticks.

name: Overstuffed Zombie
description: His cholesterol level is off the charts, and yet he seems to be in remarkably good Health.

name: Paparazzi Zombie
description: Why is everyone always screaming and running away in his photos?

name: Parasol Zombie
description: Her favorite author is Brain Austen.

name: Pied Piper
description: He was told that playing the pipe would summon raccoons. But whatevs.

name: Planetary Gladiator
description: He's still not sure if he should defend Pluto or not.

name: Pogo Bouncer
description: Not the most efficient mode of transportation, but definitely the most fun.

name: Pool Shark
description: Not actually a shark.

name: Portal Technician
description: Soon everyone will own their own portal. But for now, he enjoys being an early adopter.

name: Possessed
description: There's nothing like a good possession to perk a Zombie up.

name: Pot of Gold
description: The luck of the Zombies!

name: Primeval Yeti
description: What's for lunch? Mostly solid stone.

name: Primordial Cheese Shover
description: He's wheely cheesy.

name: Quarterly Bonus
description: Zombie Pirates kick a lot of booty. Maybe someday they'll figure how to spend it.

name: Quasar Wizard
description: You can call him Quazard for short.

name: Quickdraw Con Man
description: How did he know the Plants were coming? Because four-armed is forewarned.

name: Ra Zombie
description: Some nights sundown comes early...

name: Raiding Raptor
description: Amazomb helmets mostly protect their ears from all the roaring.

name: Regifting Zombie
description: Regifting: Is it really an embarrassing social faux pas? Or is it just good ol' recycling?

name: Rock Wall
description: Better than a wall of scissors, but worse than a wall of paper.

name: Rocket Science
description: Turns out, it IS rocket science.

name: Rodeo Gargantuar
description: Why yes, this IS his first rodeo.

name: Rolling Stone
description: Gives new meaning to the phrase "rock n' roll".

name: Screen Door Zombie
description: Little known fact: He carries a door to protect himself from solar radiation.

name: Secret Agent
description: He likes his brains shaken, not stirred.

name: Shieldcrusher Viking
description: Been crushing shields since the 9th Century. Has gotten pretty darn good at it.

name: Shrink Ray
description: Rustbolt gets a kick out of belittling Plants.

name: Skunk Punk
description: Smelly Zombie is the only zombie who really gets him, you know?

name: Slammin Smackdown
description: The Smash's wrestling moves are real all right. Too real. Just ask any Plant.

name: Smashing Gargantuar
description: When he phones home, it means something completely different.

name: Smelly Zombie
description: Casual acquaintances don't understand where his pets are. They don't realize that stinkflies can be such tender little friends.

name: Smoke Bomb
description: Good for eluding the enemy. Bad for the lungs.

name: Sneezing Zombie
description: Flowers give her awful allergies and sickening sneezes. Is that why she wears one on her head?

name: Snorkel Zombie
description: Breathing out: check. Breathing in? Not so much.

name: Space Cadet
description: His body is in space, but his head is in the clouds.

name: Space Cowboy
description: Only in the big wide sky will he find Serenity.

name: Space Ninja
description: You will never hear him coming in the vacuum of space.

name: Space Pirate
description: At first he just dabbled in space piracy, but then he got hooked.

name: Squirrel Herder
description: The only thing more difficult than herding cats.

name: Stayin Alive
description: For Electric Boogaloo, "alive" is a relative term.

name: Stealthy Imp
description: Don't look, but there's one behind you right now!

name: Stompadon
description: With a cerebellum the size of a Wall-Nut, it specializes in oversized bodies for little brains.

name: Stupid Cupid
description: What's love got to do with it? Honestly, he has no idea.

name: Sugary Treat
description: Tooth decay: Not exactly a big concern for Zombies.

name: Summoning
description: It's like a blind date... but with Zombies... and fighting.

name: Sumo Wrestler
description: Hey, he's in shape. Round is a shape.

name: Super Stench
description: That's the smell of victory!

name: Supernova Gargantuar
description: This one's got a real temper on him. When he decides to take out a Plant...it's brutal. Just brutal.

name: Surfer Zombie
description: He used to hang 10 with the best of them, but ever since he lost that toe to a shark he hasn't been able to hang more than 9.

name: Surprise Gargantuar
description: Surprise! It's a brains-eating monster at your party!

name: Swabbie
description: When he's not fighting Plants, you'll find him swabbing the Zombot Plank Walker's poop deck.

name: Swashbuckler Zombie
description: Buckles his swash like no other.

name: Synchronized Swimmer
description: It takes a lot of practice for two Zombies' heads to fall off at the exact same time.

name: Tankylosaurus
description: When not exploring Hollow Earth's jungles, they like to go clubbing.

name: Team Mascot
description: Say what you will about the costume - Zombie morale has never been better.

name: Telepathy
description: You're thinking of a number between 1 and braaaaains.

name: Teleport
description: Feels like cheating.

name: Teleportation Station
description: Teleportation is a relatively new technology. Has a few kinks that need ironing out. So yeah, sometimes things get a little...mixed up.

name: Teleportation Zombie
description: The phone cord stretches to another dimension.

name: Tennis Champ
description: When it's Plants vs. Zombies, the score is never love-love.

name: Terrify
description: Just a disembodied Zombie head screaming uncontrollably. Nope. Nothing terrifying about that.

name: Terror-Fromer 10000
description: This is Huge-Gigantacus' greatest invention ever. It's also his only invention. But it's best not to point that out to him.

name: The Chickening
description: So. Many. Feathers.

name: Thinking Cap
description: Only the best and the brainiest University Zombies graduate to using full-fledged Superpowers.

name: Tomb Raiser Zombie
description: He's good at making friends.

name: Total Eclipse
description: Zombies love a good eclipse. They usually celebrate by eating Plants. And brains.

name: Toxic Waste Imp
description: All the radioactive glow... none of the super powers.

name: Transformation Station
description: According to the Transformation Station brochure, every Zombie who visits is guaranteed to shuffle away feeling like a brand new Zombie.

name: Trapper Territory
description: Plants do not like feeling trapped. Can you blame them?

name: Trapper Zombie
description: Purveyor of only the finest banana peel coats.

name: Trash Can Zombie
description: It's dark and quiet in there. He finds it soothing. That's what no one gets.

name: Trick-or-Treater
description: Trick or Treat? He is haunted by that question - and by an answer that continues to elude him.

name: Trickster
description: Never gets tired of the rubber chicken gag.

name: Triple Threat
description: That's how you get Imps.

name: Triplication
description: An Imp, a Zombie, and Gargantuar walk into a bar...

name: Turkey Rider
description: He insists that, as far as modes of transportation go, turkeys outperform dolphins, walruses, and kangaroos any day.

name: Turquoise Skull Zombie
description: The mystical Turquoise Skull stole the sun itself, lighting the way to the Mustache Monuments.

name: Undying Pharaoh
description: If the Plants think they're going to beat the Undying Pharaoh, they're in de-Nile.

name: Unexpected Gifts
description: "For the 4th day of Feastivus, my true love gave to me: 1 Fire Rooster, 1 Sneezing Zombie, 1 Bad Moon Rising, and a partridge in a Pear Tree!"

name: Unlife of the Party
description: His archenemy is the Wall-Flower.

name: Unthawed Viking
description: What's the best way to cross the ocean? Freeze it first. How hard could it be?

name: Valkyrie
description: It's not easy hitting those high notes when all you can sing is, "Braaaaains."

name: Vengeful Cyborg
description: His toupee went missing in the heat of battle and he's been furious about it ever since.

name: Vimpire
description: He vants to suck your chlorophyll.

name: Vitamin Z
description: Side effects include headaches, blurred vision, and insatiable hunger.

name: Walrus Rider
description: A walrus seemed the obvious choice. After all, horses don't go on land *and* water.

name: Wannabe Hero
description: He has Super Brainz stickers all over his binder.

name: Weed Spray
description: Act now! Rids your lawn of pesky weeds... and Peashooters and Sunflowers. Also Wall-Nuts.

name: Witchs Familiar
description: Immorticia was cleaning her belfry when, lo and behold, she found bats in there.

name: Wizard Gargantuar
description: A wizard did it. An enormous, green, Zombie wizard.

name: Wormhole Gatekeeper
description: "Stand here and guard this gate with your unlife," she was told. And that's what she's been doing ever since.

name: Yeti Lunchbox
description: What's inside? A peanut butter and brains sandwich... with the crusts cut off.

name: Zom-Bats
description: Like Chihuahuas with wings... and fangs... and a taste for Plants.

name: Zom-Blob
description: This is why you shouldn't drink primordial soup.

name: Zombie Chicken
description: Question: Which came first, the Chicken or the egg? Answer: The Zombie!

name: Zombie Coach
description: There's no "i" in Zombee!

name: Zombie High Diver
description: He used to be afraid of heights... and water. True story.

name: Zombie King
description: Contrary to popular opinion, it's just OK to be king.

name: Zombie Middle Manager
description: Like most managers, bringing pain to his employees gives him strength.

name: Zombie Yeti
description: Enjoys warm hugs.

name: Zombies Best Friend
description: "What counts is not necessarily the size of the dog in the fight; it's the size of the fight in the dog." - Wight Z. Diesenhower

name: Zombology Teacher
description: "If you don't pay attention in class, you'll never improve your brains..."

name: Zombot 1000
description: The first 999 Zombots are now considered classics.

name: Zombot Aerostatic Gondola
description: These pirates hit hard, then escape at 3 miles per hour.

name: Zombot Battlecruiser 5000
description: Not space legal in 35 different galaxies.

name: Zombot Dinotronic Mechasaur
